keyMoments.title: Ace's Pride in the Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: In the Arabasta flashback, Ace explains to Luffy his deep pride in being part of the Whitebeard Pirates and his respect for Whitebeard.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the loyalty and bond within the Whitebeard Pirates, setting up why they will risk everything to save Ace at Marineford.

keyMoments.title: Ace's Pursuit of Blackbeard for Betrayal
keyMoments.description: Ace recalls pursuing Blackbeard for killing a Whitebeard Pirates crewmate, demonstrating the crew's code of loyalty.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strong bonds within the Whitebeard Pirates and how Ace's loyalty led to his capture.

jollyRoger: A skull with a white mustache and crossbones

keyMoments.title: Blackbeard's Use of Ace to Become Shichibukai
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard reveals that he captured Ace specifically to use him as a bargaining chip to become a Shichibukai.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the ruthless ambition of the Blackbeard Pirates and their willingness to betray former allies for power.
